#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::StartAgreement(shared_ptr<MultiStringMarshallable> msg) {
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_); 
  auto msgs = msg->data_;
  string oid = msgs[0];
  Log_debug("start agreement is called for oid: %s", oid);
  uint64_t index = 0, currTerm = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd(msg);
  shared_ptr<IntEvent> msgAck;
  msgAck = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>(1);

  bool is_leader = this->GetRaftServer().Start(cmd, &index, &currTerm);

  if(!is_leader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }

  msgAcks.insert({oid, msgAck});
  msgAck->Wait(10*1000*1000);
  msgAcks.erase(oid);

  if(msgAck->status_ == Event::TIMEOUT) {
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }

  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

bool KvServer::isLeader() {
  bool is_leader = false;
  uint64_t curr_term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&is_leader, &curr_term);

  return is_leader;
}



int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  */
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_); 

  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);

  return this->StartAgreement(s);
}



int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_); 
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);



  return this->StartAgreement(s);
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx_); 
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  /* your code here */
  auto resp = this->StartAgreement(s);

  if(resp == KV_SUCCESS) {
    auto it = dict.find(k);
    string value = it->second;
    *v = value;
  }

  return resp;
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  auto msgs = v->data_;
  Log_debug("On next command is called with oid: %s", msgs[0].c_str());
  string oid = msgs[0];
  char op = msgs[1][0];
  string key = msgs[2];

  auto it = dict.find(key);
  if(op != 'g') {
    string value = msgs[3];
    if(it == dict.end()) {
      dict.insert({key, value});
    } else {
      it->second = op == 'p' ? 
		value : it->second + value;
    }
  }

  if(msgAcks.find(oid) != msgAcks.end()) {
    auto msgAck = msgAcks.find(oid)->second;
    msgAck->Set(1);
  }
  return;
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
